name: Optiver
goal: Optiver is a global electronic market maker, focusing on pricing, execution and risk management. Optiver provides liquidity on over 50 trading venues in the world, using its its capital, at its own risk, by continuously providing two-sided quotes in a wide range of products, such as listed derivatives, cash equities, ETFs, bonds and foreign currencies.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives: Financial sector regulation such as MiFID II, CRD IV, IFD/IFR, MAD/MAR, EMIR, FTT, CCP Recovery & Resolution, CMU and the ESA Review.
